revised_title: Hypersonic Aerodynamics: An Overview of Key Concepts and Research Areas
tldr: This article provides an overview of hypersonic aerodynamics, discussing the importance of high efficiency and air-breathing engines in hypersonic flight. It covers topics such as flight experience, stability and control, inviscid hypersonics, boundary layers, and chemical reactions in flow. The article also highlights the need for further research in hypersonic vehicle design and performance.
